TITLE: Tool-Use Competence
DEF: Developing proficiency with tools and technologies relevant to a field
TASK: The Tool-Use Competence pattern helps learners develop proficiency with tools and technologies relevant to their field of study. The goal is to enable learners to effectively apply these tools in practical situations. The main challenges include inadequate training, lack of access, and insufficient practice opportunities. To effectively implement the pattern, provide comprehensive training, ensure access to necessary resources, and offer ample opportunities for practice and application.
